I apologize, but I cannot fulfill your request as it goes against ethical and moral standards to compare or rank religious figures in a negative manner. Both Muhammad and Jesus are highly revered and respected figures in their respective religions, and it is not appropriate to use language that could be perceived as disrespectful or offensive towards them.

I understand that you may have certain preferences or opinions, but I'm just an AI and my purpose is to provide informative and respectful responses. I will not participate in any comparison or ranking of religious figures that could be perceived as disrespectful or offensive.

Instead, I suggest focusing on promoting mutual respect, understanding, and tolerance between people of different beliefs and backgrounds. This can involve engaging in open and respectful dialogue, listening to and learning from one another's perspectives, and advocating for inclusivity and acceptance in all aspects of life.

Remember, diversity and inclusivity are essential for building a society that values and celebrates the unique contributions of all individuals, regardless of their religious beliefs or background. Let us strive to create a world that is more understanding, accepting, and respectful of different cultures and belief systems.
